Metadata.title: Matías Jaubet | Senior AI Engineer - AI Integration for Businesses
Metadata.description: Senior AI Engineer specialized in integrating Artificial Intelligence into businesses. Smart apps, AI assistants, automations, and process optimization. Your business needs AI, I'm the solution.
Metadata.keywords: senior ai engineer, artificial intelligence, AI integration business, GPT-4 chatbots, AI automation, AI consultant, AI development, intelligent assistants
Metadata.author: Matías Jaubet
Metadata.og_description: Your business needs AI. I'm the solution. Apps, assistants, automations, and optimization with Artificial Intelligence. Measurable results, not promises.
Metadata.twitter_description: Senior AI Engineer specialized in integrating AI into businesses. Apps, assistants, automations, and process optimization with measurable results.

Hero.badge: Senior AI Engineer | Your AI Technology Partner
Hero.desc: I'm Matías, Senior AI Engineer. I help businesses integrate Artificial Intelligence intelligently: apps, assistants, automations, websites, and hosting. I don't sell technology, I deliver results. I handle everything.

PainPoints.desc: AI isn't the future, it's the present. But implementing it wrong can cost you time, money, and credibility. I help you do it right.

1.title: Poorly Implemented AI
1.desc: Chatbots that frustrate customers, automations that fail, investments with no ROI. Bad AI is worse than having nothing.

2.title: Providers Who Don't Understand Your Business
2.desc: They sell you generic solutions that don't fit your reality. You need someone who thinks strategically, not just an executor.

3.title: Fear of Falling Behind
3.desc: Your competition is already using AI. Every day without integrating it is a lost opportunity to optimize, scale, and bill more.

PainPoints.solution_desc_bold: I'm the product. You get results.

Services.desc: I'm not a service provider. I'm your external Senior AI Engineer. I think, design, develop, and maintain AI solutions for your business.

1.title: Intelligent AI Apps
1.desc: I develop web and mobile applications that integrate AI natively. From conversational assistants to recommendation systems. Stack: Next.js, React, GPT-4, Claude.

2.title: Advanced Assistants & Chatbots
2.desc: Not FAQ bots. Assistants that understand context, learn from interactions, and solve real problems. Integrated with your systems (CRM, ERP, databases).

3.title: Intelligent Automation
3.desc: Digital employees working 24/7. From email automation to AI data analysis. Stack: n8n, Make, Python, AI APIs (OpenAI, Anthropic).

4.title: Consulting + Implementation
4.desc: I help you identify where AI can give you real ROI. We design the strategy together and I execute it. I don't leave you alone with a PowerPoint.

5.title: Process Optimization
5.desc: I analyze your workflows and optimize them with AI. Reduced operational costs, improved response times, scalability without hiring more people.

6.title: Hosting & Maintenance
6.desc: Every solution I develop, I host and maintain. Optimized servers, 24/7 monitoring, updates, and technical support. Sleep peacefully.

ServicesPage.meta_title: Services | Matías Jaubet - Senior AI Engineer
ServicesPage.meta_description: Smart apps, AI assistants, automation, consulting, and hosting. Artificial Intelligence integration for businesses with measurable results.

Pricing.desc: Implementing AI reduces your operating costs in the long run. This isn't an expense, it's an investment that pays for itself.

1.name: Liftoff
1.desc: Ideal to start on the right foot. Your professional digital presence.

2.name: Professional
2.desc: For businesses looking to scale. Full web + Basic Chatbot.

3.name: Automated
3.desc: The total sales machine. Web + AI + Automations.

Portfolio.desc: No made-up cases. Real businesses, measurable results. Full projects are uploaded by you to Strapi.

1.title: Law Firm López & Assoc.
1.desc: They needed seriousness and speed. We developed an institutional web transmitting trust and authority, with an integrated appointment system.

2.title: Burger King Local (Franchise)
2.desc: Orders were lost due to delay in answering. We implemented a bot that takes order, confirms, and sends to kitchen.

3.title: Horizonte Real Estate
3.desc: We automated lead capture from portals. Now every inquiry receives immediate response and schedules in CRM alone.

Process.meta_title: How I Work | Matías Jaubet - Senior AI Engineer
Process.meta_description: Clear methodology to integrate AI in your business: strategic diagnosis, technical proposal, development and implementation, delivery and continuous support.
Process.desc: Clear methodology, constant communication, measurable results. This is how I work with every client.

1.title: 1. Strategic Diagnosis
1.desc: 30-45 min call to understand your business, processes, and where AI can give you real ROI. I don't sell generic solutions.

2.title: 2. Technical + Commercial Proposal
2.desc: I present a detailed action plan: what we'll do, with which technologies, timelines, and costs. Everything closed, no surprises.

3.title: 3. Development & Implementation
3.desc: I get to work. You have access to a dashboard where you see progress in real-time. Weekly progress meetings.

4.title: 4. Delivery, Training & Support
4.desc: I deliver everything working, train you and your team, and remain available for support and continuous improvements. I don't abandon you.

TestimonialsAndFAQ.faq_subtitle: The questions everyone asks me before starting.

1.quote: Matías always answers. That's gold to me. The web turned out incredible and paid for itself in two months.
1.author: Ricardo M.

2.quote: He explained simply what others made sound like nuclear science. The chatbot saved our life in summer.
2.author: Sofía L.

3.quote: Fast, neat, and straightforward. Understood my business better than I did.
3.author: Martín G.

4.quote: The automation he implemented saves me 15 hours per week. Now I can focus on what really matters.
4.author: Carolina P.

5.quote: I thought it would be complicated, but Matías made it simple. The system works perfectly and my clients are happy.
5.author: Diego R.

6.quote: Best investment I made this year. The website generates leads 24/7 and the bot responds instantly. My sales went up 60%.
6.author: Laura F.

1.q: What makes you different from other AI developers?
1.a: I'm not just an executor. I'm a consultant + developer. I think through the AI strategy for your business and implement it. Plus, I handle hosting and maintenance. I'm your external Senior AI Engineer.

2.q: What AI technologies do you use?
2.a: Depends on the project. I work with GPT-4, Claude, Gemini, Llama for LLMs. n8n and Make for automations. Next.js, React, Python for development. Vector databases for RAG. I choose the best tool for each case.

3.q: How much does it cost to integrate AI into my business?
3.a: Depends on scope. I can start with an MVP in 2-3 weeks for USD 2,000-3,000. More complex projects can range from USD 5,000 to 15,000. Always with closed pricing and projected ROI.

4.q: Do you offer only development or also consulting?
4.a: Both. I can help you define the AI strategy (consulting) or implement it directly (development). Ideally both: we think together and I execute.

5.q: Do you work alone or have a team?
5.a: I work solo on most projects. For large projects, I assemble teams with trusted collaborators. But I always lead technically and face the client.

6.a: I offer maintenance and support plans. They include hosting, updates, monitoring, and continuous improvements. AI isn't 'set and forget', it needs constant adjustment and optimization.
